message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV 

The paper proposes a novel framework for learning options in reinforcement learning, which involves using two parallel augmented MDPs and an actor-critic algorithm. This work is highly relevant to the sub-field of machine learning, specifically reinforcement learning, which is covered by the cs.LG and cs.AI categories. Additionally, the paper applies the proposed framework to challenging robot simulation tasks, which falls under the categories of cs.RO (robotics) and cs.SY (systems and control). Finally, the paper also mentions using state-value functions as critics, which is a common technique in computer vision, making cs.CV a possible category as well.
